title: Ep. 151 - A Mother Forces Son To Be Transgender - Is it Legal?
description:
Today on the show we'll talk about the horrifying, infuriating case of the young boy who is being pushed into transgenderism by his mother and his doctors. Mental illness is being fostered inside the mind of this poor child, and he's not the only one. Date: 11-28-2018
